Title: Resolutely support the patriotic just struggle of the people of Congo (Léopoldville)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: Congo (Léopoldville) was renamed Zaire in 1971, and Democratic Republic of the Congo in 1997. Léopoldville is now Kinshasa.
Theme: Foreign Friends: National Liberation MovementsForeign Friends: African Friends
